author: costin
msg: Another update to function names, make it work when no worker.properties is used.

author: costin
msg: Fix REUSE_WORKER code ( it was done with a very old APR ).
Add an option to allow workers.properties settings to be done in httpd.conf.
Usefull for quick changes/debug/etc. I've done it only in 2.0 connector,
if it proves usefull we can port it to 1.3 also.

author: costin
msg: - expose the method that replaces properties, ant-style ( used internally to read
worker.properties ). I need it also using http.conf only.
- with some strange properties you can get an infinite loop. Fixed now.

author: costin
msg: Add 2 sample defines. The first is just a sample ( it has the default value ), the
second is REUSE_WORKER, which was disabled long ago because we wanted to use the
stable code. This works by using per-thread data, I'll try it and if it works I'll leave
it on for a while ( until someone finds a reason to turn it off )
( I'll keep it on only in the ant-based build, which is also experimental right now )

author: costin
msg: Add support for <def>ines, see build.xml for usage.
